name: Farsight DNSDB
description: Farsight DNSDB Passive DNS API integration

options.name: Ignored IP or Domain list
options.description: List of domains or IPs (space delimited) that you never want to send to DNSDB

options.name: Ignored Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Ignored IP Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Time Last After
options.description: Filters out results where the last seen time is after the given time.  The parameters expects an integer (Unix/Epoch time) with seconds granularity or a relative time in seconds (preceded by -). The default is to return results within the last year.

options.name: Lookup Limit
options.description: The maximum number of results to return per IP or Domain lookup.

options.name: Maximum Number of Tags to Display
options.description: Set the maximum number of unique summary tags to display in the notification overlay.

options.name: Lookup Domains
options.description: If checked, the integration will lookup Domains

options.name: Lookup IPv4 and IPv6 Addresses
options.description: If checked, the integration will lookup IPv4 and IPv6 addresses
